## fit0111 variable

Inline function. Fits value `x` in \[0..1\] interval to \[-1..+1\] interval. No clamping performed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fit0111: <T extends Prim>(x: Term<T>) => Op2<T>
```
